title: Paint It Purple
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 46 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 10L
description: The girl in Paint It Purple loves purple paint. She takes her paintbrush to everything in sight, including the hose, her shoes, and-by accident-her mom. Her mom, unfortunately, is not as fond of purple paint as she is. Students will love this humorous story and its charming illustrations.
reviewWords: door, fence, grass, hose, mom, paint, purple, shoes, swing
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /p/ sound
phonics: Consonants : Identify initial and final consonant Pp
